com.revature.controllers

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revature.controllers.UserController

  • @RestController
 @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/users")
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object

      UserController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createUser(User user)
      This method is called when a post request is sent to he backend and the URI is "/users" with a User object in the request body represented as a JSON media type.
      void deleteUser(int uid)
      This method is called when a delete request is sent to the backend and the URI is "/users/{uid}" This method is used to remove a User record from the database.
      java.util.List<User> getAllUsers()
      This method is called when a get request is sent to the backend and the URI is "/users".
      User getUserByEmail(@NotEmpty java.lang.String email)
      This method is called when a get request is sent to the backend and the URI is "/users?email={email}" This method returns a User which had the email specified in the URI
      User getUserById(int uid)
      This method is called when a get request is sent to the backend and the URI is "/users/{uid}" This method returns a User which has the ID specified in the URI.
      void updateUser(User user)
      This method is called when a put request is sent to the backend and the URI is "/users" with a User object in the request body represented as a JSON media type.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllUsers

        @GetMapping
public java.util.List<User> getAllUsers()
        This method is called when a get request is sent to the backend and the URI is "/users". This method returns all of the Users in the users table through the JSON media type.
        Returns:
        a list of all the users in the users table
        See Also:
        UserService

      • getUserById

        @GetMapping(value="{uid}")
public User getUserById(@PathVariable(value="uid")
                                                    int uid)
        This method is called when a get request is sent to the backend and the URI is "/users/{uid}" This method returns a User which has the ID specified in the URI.
        Parameters:
        uid - the User ID of the user you would like to find.
        Returns:
        the user which has the specified ID.
        See Also:
        UserService

      • getUserByEmail

        @GetMapping(params="email")
public User getUserByEmail(@RequestParam(value="email") @NotEmpty
                                                        @NotEmpty java.lang.String email)
        This method is called when a get request is sent to the backend and the URI is "/users?email={email}" This method returns a User which had the email specified in the URI
        Parameters:
        email - the User email of the user you would like to find.
        Returns:
        the User which has the specified email
        See Also:
        UserService

      • createUser

        @PostMapping(consumes="application/json")
public void createUser(@RequestBody
                                                                  User user)
        This method is called when a post request is sent to he backend and the URI is "/users" with a User object in the request body represented as a JSON media type. This method is able to save a User entity to the database.
        Parameters:
        user - the User which you would like to make a record for in the database.

      • updateUser

        @PutMapping(consumes="application/json")
public void updateUser(@RequestBody
                                                                 User user)
        This method is called when a put request is sent to the backend and the URI is "/users" with a User object in the request body represented as a JSON media type. This method is able to update a User entity in the database.
        Parameters:
        user - the User which you would like to update in the database.

      • deleteUser

        @DeleteMapping(value="{uid}")
public void deleteUser(@PathVariable(value="uid")
                                                      int uid)
        This method is called when a delete request is sent to the backend and the URI is "/users/{uid}" This method is used to remove a User record from the database.
        Parameters:
        uid - The User ID of the User you would like to delete from the database.
